3/4 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature,1 cup brown sugar, packed,1/4 cup granulated sugar,1 large egg,1 large egg yolk,1 tablespoon vanilla extract,1 3/4 cups all purpose flour,1 teaspoon baking soda,1 teaspoon salt,1/3 cup coconut oil,1 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips,1 tablespoon flaky sea salt for garnish,,
